moves.1. c4: The English, one of my favorites.
moves.5... O-O 6. Nge2: I think this is better than Nf3; it gives the Knight more "flexibility"!
moves.6... c5 7. O-O Nc6 8. d3: Keep my Pawns together is best, I think.
moves.8... e6 9. h3: Planning Be3 but if I went Be3 before 9. h3, he could go Ng4!
moves.14... Qb8 15. e5: !! (maybe it doesn't deserve "!!") Threatening the Knight on c6 and the d6-Pawn!
